Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.util.config

Class Config

java.lang.Object
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.util.config.Config
public class Config extends Object
Represent a configuration manager that handles reading, writing, and manipulating configuration data through various types of input sources.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    • Config

      public Config(org.ini4j.Ini ini)
      Primary constructor: instantiates a Config object using the provided Ini configuration.
      Parameters:
      ini - the Ini object containing the configuration details.

    • Config

      public Config(Reader reader) throws IOException
      Secondary constructor: instantiates a Config instance by initializing it with the provided Reader.
      Parameters:
      reader - the Reader object from which configuration data is read.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during reading from the Reader.

    • Config

      public Config(InputStream stream) throws IOException
      Secondary constructor: instantiates a Config instance by initializing it with the provided InputStream.
      Parameters:
      stream - the InputStream object from which configuration data is read.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during reading from the InputStream.

    • Config

      public Config(URL resource) throws IOException
      Secondary constructor: instantiates a Config instance by initializing it with the configuration data provided by the specified URL resource.
      Parameters:
      resource - the URL from which the configuration data is read.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during reading from the URL resource.

    • Config

      public Config(File input) throws IOException
      Secondary constructor: instantiates a Config object by reading the configuration data from the provided File.
      Parameters:
      input - the File object from which configuration data is read.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during reading from the file.

    • Config

      public Config(String file) throws IOException
      Secondary constructor: instantiates a Config object by reading the configuration data from the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      file - the path of the file from which configuration data is read.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during reading from the file.

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static Config load(Class<?> clazz) throws IOException
      Method to load the appropriate configuration.

      If clazz is not null, then we look for config.ini relative to the given class. If clazz is null, or if the resource cannot be found relative to the class, then we look in the root directory.

      Parameters:
      clazz - the Class in which to look for the config.ini file (may be null).
      Returns:
      a new Config.
      Throws:
      IOException - if config.ini cannot be found using the locations described above.

    • load

      public static Config load() throws IOException
      Loads the default configuration file.

      This method is a shorthand for loading the configuration using the load(Class<?> clazz) method with a null parameter. It looks for the config.ini file in the root directory if it cannot be found relative to a class.

      Returns:
      the loaded Config instance.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the config.ini file cannot be found in the expected locations.

    • copy

      public Config copy(String sectionName, String optionName, String value)
      Method to copy this Config, but setting sectionName.optionName to be value. If sectionName does not already exist, it will be added to the result.
      Parameters:
      sectionName - the section name.
      optionName - the option name.
      value - the new value.
      Returns:
      a new Config as described.

    • get

      public String get(Object sectionName, Object optionName)
      Retrieves the value of the specified option from the given section as a String.
      Parameters:
      sectionName - the name of the section from which to retrieve the option.
      optionName - the name of the option to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the value of the specified option as a String.

    • get

      public <T> T get(Object sectionName, Object optionName, Class<T> clazz)
      Retrieves the value of the specified option from the given section and converts it to the specified class type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the value being returned.
      Parameters:
      sectionName - the name of the section from which to retrieve the option.
      optionName - the name of the option to retrieve.
      clazz - the Class type to which the value should be converted.
      Returns:
      the value of the specified option, converted to the specified class type.

    • getBoolean

      public boolean getBoolean(String sectionName, String optionName)
      Retrieves the value of the specified option from the given section as a boolean.
      Parameters:
      sectionName - the name of the section from which to retrieve the option.
      optionName - the name of the option to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the value of the specified option as a boolean.

    • getInt

      public int getInt(String sectionName, String optionName, int defaultValue)
      Retrieves the value of the specified option from the given section and converts it to an integer. If the value is not found or cannot be retrieved, the specified default value is returned.
      Parameters:
      sectionName - the name of the section from which to retrieve the option.
      optionName - the name of the option to retrieve.
      defaultValue - the default value to return if the option is not found or cannot be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the value of the specified option as an integer, or the default value if not found.

    • getLong

      public long getLong(String sectionName, String optionName, long defaultValue)
      Retrieves the value of the specified option from the given section and converts it to a long. If the value is not found or cannot be retrieved, the specified default value is returned.
      Parameters:
      sectionName - the name of the section from which to retrieve the option.
      optionName - the name of the option to retrieve.
      defaultValue - the default value to return if the option is not found or cannot be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the value of the specified option as a long, or the default value if not found.

    • getString

      public String getString(String sectionName, String optionName, String defaultValue)
      Retrieves the value of the specified option from the given section as a String. If the value is null or empty, returns the provided default value.
      Parameters:
      sectionName - the name of the section from which to retrieve the option.
      optionName - the name of the option to retrieve.
      defaultValue - the default value to return if the option is not found or is empty.
      Returns:
      the value of the specified option as a String, or the default value if not found or empty.

    • getComment

      public String getComment(String key)
      Retrieves the comment associated with the specified key from the configuration. If the key has not been logged, logs a debug message containing the key and its associated comment.
      Parameters:
      key - the key for which the comment is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the comment associated with the specified key, or null if no comment exists.

    • getAll

      public Collection<org.ini4j.Profile.Section> getAll(Object key)
      Retrieves all sections associated with the specified key.
      Parameters:
      key - the key for which the associated sections are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a collection of Profile.Section objects associated with the specified key.

    • get

      public org.ini4j.Profile.Section get(Object key)
      Retrieves the section associated with the specified key from the configuration.
      Parameters:
      key - the key for which the associated section is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the Profile.Section object associated with the specified key, or null if no section exists for the key.

    • get

      public org.ini4j.Profile.Section get(Object key, int index)
      Retrieves the section associated with the specified key and index from the configuration.
      Parameters:
      key - the key for which the associated section is to be retrieved.
      index - the index of the section to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Profile.Section object associated with the specified key and index, or null if no section exists for the key and index.
